import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Card } from '@mui/material' const Blog = ({ blog, liked, deleted }) => { const [fullInfo, setFullInfo] = useState(false) return( <> {/* {JSON.stringify(blog)} */}
{blog.title} {blog.author}
{ fullInfo &&
{blog.url}
likes {blog.likes}
{ blog.user ? blog.user.username : '' }
} ) } export default Blog
